summary: The diff does not show any implemented change to the Reports > Member Financial Overview `moneyDue` calculation. Only type definitions are visible in the truncated `backend/main.mo`, and `project_state.json` was modified in a way not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the admin Reports data so that, in Reports > Member Financial Overview, the returned `ReportMember.moneyDue` value represents the correct outstanding balance for each member (plan price minus sum of relevant payments; never negative; matches by current identifier approach; no traps; consistent with UI).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided `backend/main.mo` diff excerpt contains type definitions but no visible changes to the report-building logic or any computation of `ReportMember.moneyDue` from membership plan price minus summed payments. Because the file content is truncated and no relevant logic is shown, there is insufficient evidence that the required calculation fix was implemented.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; only types shown, no report/moneyDue calculation visible)

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update (schema/projectStateVersion/summary/existing_features listing) unrelated to fixing `ReportMember.moneyDue` calculation.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused on a backend fix for the Reports money due calculation and includes constraints/non-goals about not adding new UI/report sections. Modifying `project_state.json` is not mentioned as part of the requested work.
